sentences.english: Koo- ka- bur- ra sits in the old gum tree.
sentences.chinese: 笑翠鳥坐在一棵老橡膠樹上。

sentences.english: Anyone knows an ant can't move a rubber-tree plant .
sentences.chinese: 人人都知道一個小小的螞蟻是不能挪動橡膠樹的。

sentences.english: Some helpful opinions on polyploid breeding of Hevea brasiliensis were proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了改進橡膠樹倍性育種的途徑與研究方向。

sentences.english: It is summarize the study on inclined upward tapping of the rubber tree in the world.
sentences.chinese: 綜述了國內外橡膠樹低割面陰刀割膠技術的研究結果。

sentences.english: They also planted rubber trees, and heliconium flowers.
sentences.chinese: 他們還種植橡膠樹和蠍尾焦。

sentences.english: Industrial use, mainly from Brazil, natural rubber latex Hevea.
sentences.chinese: 工業用，主要來自巴西，天然膠乳橡膠樹。

sentences.english: Money plants and rubber plants are other all-time favorites.
sentences.chinese: 金錢樹和橡膠樹也是永恆的選擇。
